ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Looking for Xakra Bile & rockhopper blood
ygData.msgSnippet: Ahhh,   that is a problem I know well.  you have to just keep killing them (the blood & Bile are fairly rare drops).. to get the young rockhoppers to spawn,
ygData.messageBody:
Ahhh,   that is a problem I know well.  you have to just keep killing them (the blood & Bile are fairly rare drops).. to get the young rockhoppers to spawn,  you have to kill either the scorpions or the whiptail scorpions,  and I think you have to kill the rhinobeetle hatchlings to get the xakra larvae to spawn...  it is truly a pain in the behind to get the Items needed for that quest.  It would be MUCH easier if the Items were not no drop. 

Toni (aka Katashaka Naboombu 40 Shamam)

  ariaya@... wrote:

Hi all,

I'm trying to do the progressive pottery quest with my vah shir bard,
but I'm running into supply issues. 

I've tried killing all the worms & young rockhoppers I can find in the
Shar Val Pit, but I can't seem to find the bile & blood!  I got just
enough bile to get my drum & to get the first part of the pottery quest
done, but I can't seem to get any more!!

So far I know Xakra bile drops off of Xakra Larvae & the rockhopper
blood drops off of young rockhoppers .. both in the shar val pit.

Any suggestions?

Thanks
Ariaya, Ranger of 20 seasons
Cariaya, Bard of the 8th circle
Sariaya, Enchanter of the 9th circle
Heart of the Dunedain, Terris-Thule Server
ariaya@...
